parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies an MSK configuration.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies an MSK configuration.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the configuration. The possible states are ACTIVE, DELETING, and DELETE_FAILED.
